modShortDescription: Changed from cold resistance to heat resistance. The mod has a localization file, Wolfbain5 changed it for Spanish and English.
modDescription:
Changed from cold resistance to heat resistance. The mod has a localization file, Wolfbain5 changed it for Spanish and English, if you speak a different supported language, simply replace the word for cold to heat and it should work fine.

**[Download](https://github.com/wolfbain5/7dtd-a19/raw/master/yucca%20smoothie%20fix.rar)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19825-wolfbain5s-a19-mods/).

**Credits:** [Wolfbain5](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/wolfbain5/)
